resourceTemplates.name: mcp-plugin-tools
resourceTemplates.title: MCP plugin tools
resourceTemplates.description: Lists all tools available for the plugin specified by {pluginName}.

resourceTemplates.name: mcp-editor-decoders-mimetype
resourceTemplates.title: MCP Editor decoders by MIME type
